quoteText:
All user data is stored for a period of 12 hours after they visit the site. This is the bare minimum time required to analyze statistics.

Opting Out and Deletions

You may completely opt out of having your data stored by disabling all cookies. If you wish to have your data purged off the server you may write to me at admin@akshit.me.
title: The service deletes tracking data after a period of time and allows you to opt out

tosdr.case: The service deletes tracking data after a period of time and allows you to opt out
